name: A Transport Tanker Builder Sky Tower Blocks Game
name_original: A Transport Tanker Builder Sky Tower Blocks Game
description:
Toot..! Toot..!
Your tanker ship has just docked, and it’s your duty to unload the cargos.

Empty your tanker of cargo containers by transferring them into the port.
Using the crane, pile and stack them high enough to reach the skies!

Pile them strategically and be extra careful to avoid containers from falling.
If one of them falls, then you could be the end of your job!

Pile them as high as you can and top that leaderboard!

Let’s get started!
